name: Fallout 4 Name Generator
description: Wasteland wanderer looking for the perfect moniker? Tired of being just 'The Sole Survivor'? Our Fallout 4 Name Generator will forge a legend worthy of the Commonwealth!
introduction: The Commonwealth is a dangerous place, and a cool name can be the difference between being feared and forgotten. Whether you're roleplaying a ruthless raider, a benevolent settler, or a mysterious synth, our generator will cook up names that are as unique and gritty as the wasteland itself. Ditch the dull; embrace the awesome!
howToUse: First, brace yourself for awesomeness. Seriously, these names are *good*.
Click the 'Generate' button. Prepare to be amazed.
Read the names aloud! Feel the power coursing through you!
If you don't LOVE the first result (though we doubt it), just keep hitting 'Generate' until you find the perfect fit.
Copy your favorite name and paste it into your Fallout 4 character creation screen. Dominate the Commonwealth!

faqs.question: Will this generator make me a better Fallout 4 player?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee improved aiming skills, a kickass name will definitely boost your confidence and intimidate your enemies. So, yes, indirectly, absolutely!

faqs.question: Are the names lore-friendly?
faqs.answer: We've infused the generator with the spirit of Fallout 4, drawing inspiration from factions, locations, and characters. Some names are serious, some are silly, all are designed to feel at home in the wasteland.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other things besides Fallout 4?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Use them for RPG characters, online usernames, pet names... the possibilities are as endless as the glowing sea.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep generating! The algorithm is designed to produce a wide variety of names. If all else fails, use it as inspiration to create your own unique wasteland title.

faqs.question: Is this generator safe to use? Will it give my computer a virus?
faqs.answer: Totally safe! This generator runs entirely in your browser. No downloads, no viruses, just pure naming awesomeness.

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: We love community input! Feel free to send your ideas our way. If they're cool enough, we might just add them!
